name: Whatsong
tagline: Official repo of the WhatSong Android app
body:
Tired of choosing between Google Search and the other music providers? **You can have them all!**

With WhatSong, you will have all the different providers at your fingertips. With unlimited shortcuts, DashClock implementation and a special _Google Now-alike gesture_, you can have unlimited possibilities!
***
# Designed by [Lydia Selimalhigazi](https://dribbble.com/lyslydia)
***
## Supported music providers
* Sound Search
* Shazam
* Shazam Encore
* SoundHound
* SoundHound Pro
* TrackID
* musiXmatch
* SoundTracking

***
## [Join now the Google+ Community to enter the beta!](https://plus.google.com/communities/113541721473217417534)
***
## [Download the app from Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.tiwiz.whatsong)
***
[Privacy policy](http://tiwiz.github.io/WhatSong/privacy/index.html)
